description: This file is a shell script for managing a service called 'cosa' within an embedded Linux environment. It includes functions for starting and stopping the service, handling default service events (start, stop, restart), and setting service status via sysv or sysevent mechanisms. The script also sources external function files for logging and event handling.

methods.name: cosa_start
methods.description: Initiates the start sequence of the 'cosa' service by changing directory to /usr/ccsp and executing 'cosa_start.sh' in background.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Handles the process of starting the 'cosa' service, updating service status, and invoking 'cosa_start'.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Handles stopping the 'cosa' service, including killing related processes and updating status.
